headline: Cummins CEO’s Winning Mantra: Profitability and Renewable Power
summary: Jennifer Rumsey became CEO of  Cummins  in August 2022 amid historic industry turmoil.  Infatuated with electric trucks and hydrogen power, investors had bid up shares of  Nikola  and  Plug Power  which were suddenly worth about as much as Cummins, a profit machine with more than a century of history.  Rumsey has bold ambitions for Cummins’ renewable-technology business, Accelera, organized in 2023.
